title: Bao Chong Huojian Che Zhi Fei Qing De Zhaohuan
title_japanese: 爆冲火箭车之飞擎的召唤
synopsis: The repairman of Shenglun Town Starlight Vehicle Repair Shop Chi Xiaofei dreamed of challenging the Seventh Circuit and climbing to the summit of Shenglun Mountain. In an accident, Chi Xiaofei obtained a flying engine and became a blasting rocket car. Together with his friends, he challenged the Seven Stars who guarded the Seventh Circuit! There are countless difficulties and obstacles on the track to pursue dreams, and it also brings friendship, happiness and growth. In the constant challenge, Chi Xiaofei realized courage, self-confidence, persistence, planning, wisdom, trust and found himself. Facing the blasting rocket car king at the peak of Holy Wheel Mountain, what will be the fate of waiting for Chi Xiaofei? (translated from iqiyi)
